title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
itunes:title: The Rush Limbaugh Show Podcast
description:
PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 1:

Slanderous, libelous story in The Atlantic accuses Trump of calling fallen soldiers "suckers" and "losers". Trump Latrobe, PA, rally was one of his best ever. Trump is one of the most pro-military, but anti-war presidents we've ever had. Trump loves America's soldiers. Atlantic story won't be the last smear, as media realizes Biden can't beat Trump. Trump approval hits pre-virus high in Rasmussen. Trump has been accused of so many things that aren't true. Trump economy is roaring back despite big city, blue state governors keeping their states closed. Susan Glasser of The New Yorker frustrated that nothing can sway Trump supporters. The words The Atlantic used are what they believe. John Kerry thought soldiers were losers who didn't get a good education. Trump vociferously denies Atlantic story in Oval Office, Drive-Bys beg anonymous sources to come forward, Atlantic editor says they're afraid of mean tweets.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 2:

Biden jumps on Atlantic story. Atlantic editor Jeffrey Goldberg says his anonymous sources are afraid of mean tweets. Trump Latrobe rally was great performance, should get more attention today. Reporter asks Biden about Trump's soul. Millennial listener tells Rush he's responsible for making him the person he is today. Polls tightening. Antifa terrorist who murdered a Trump supporter in Portland killed by feds trying to arrest him after TV interview. Washington Post columnist threatens guaranteed violence unless Biden wins in a landslide. Reporters embarrass themselves with Biden questions, ask about "Trump's soul", all scripted questions about Trump, none about Biden. Caller asks about ESPN Michael Jordan documentary.

PODCAST SUMMARY HOUR 3:

Farce continues: COVID model projects 400K deaths. Reporters kiss Biden's ass at press conference, ask him all set-up questions about Trump, nothing about him. Highlights from Trump's Latrobe rally. What do we do about blue-state liberals moving to red states and changing them? Republicans have always been content to lose, not Trump. How do we stop red states from going blue? Compete. Trump is reshaping the GOP as the party of victory. Never Trumpers are jealous of Trump. We're in a battle to preserve Western Civilization and you don't do that by losing. No ID is needed for mail-in voting. Bolton: Trump never said it. Democrats are not confident they're going to win.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

Follow Clay & Buck on YouTube: https://www.youtube.com/c/clayandbuck

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
